name: LightArena
description:
Simple multiplayer game developed for UE4 May Jam as StarDive team.

Two players, the Alpha Fighter and the Omega Fighter, are trying to keep energy balls away from their platform in order to destroy each other, sending those energy balls to the enemy's platform.

Goal: Keep energy balls away from your platform! Every 10 secs the player who has more energy balls on his platform loses the round, losing 15 health points. Each player starts with 100 health points.
Controls:
RT -> Fire force
LT -> Jump
LB -> Sprint

Important: For this game you will need two Xbox controllers or similar.
